Example.Title: Java binding example 1 - Basics
Example.Description: If you get an error about the java binding not enabled: Edit $EXIST_HOME/conf.xml, set the xquery/@enable-java-binding attribute to "yes" and restart eXist.

Example.Title: Java binding example 2 - List files in $EXIST_HOME
Example.Description: If you get an error about the java binding not enabled: Edit $EXIST_HOME/conf.xml, set the xquery/@enable-java-binding attribute to "yes" and restart eXist.
